Sets dedent option via attr.
---
{"dedent":false}
---
<vue-component-usage dedent="true">
    testcase
        indent
</vue-component-usage>
---
<vue-component-usage-test language="html">
<template v-slot:code>testcase
    indent</template>
<template v-slot:result>testcase
    indent</template>
</vue-component-usage-test>
